title: Fee Structure Schema
description: Schema for capturing detailed fee information for a course or program.

currency.description: The currency of the fees (e.g., INR, USD).

tuition_fees.description: A list of tuition fees, broken down by semester or year.

student_type.description: The type of student the fee applies to (e.g., 'national', 'international', 'saarc').

period.description: The period for the fee (e.g., '1st Year', 'Semester 1').

amount.description: The fee amount for the period.

other_fees.description: A list of other mandatory or optional fees.

student_type.description: The type of student the fee applies to (e.g., 'national', 'international', 'saarc').

name.description: The name of the fee (e.g., 'Hostel Fee', 'Examination Fee').

description.description: A brief description of the fee.
